Question
========

In 6 patients with adult-onset diabetes, the weight (in kg) was determined with results: 84, 78, 65, 103, 91, 87. The standard deviation of this sample is equal to

Answerlist
----------

* 5.21
* 11.64
* 12.75
* 27.11

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 5.21: Incorrect
* 11.64: Incorrect
* 12.75: Correct
* 27.11: Incorrect
